description: Tropical storm Helene caused 'catastrophic' damage to Asheville’s water treatment and distribution system, cutting off at least 70% of the city’s drinking water supply.
title: In Asheville, N.C., many residents may be without drinking water for weeks

description: The once-hot Silicon Valley startup has seen its stock’s value decline 99% and is struggling to survive. That has put the spotlight on the genetic data it has on 15 million people.
title: 23andMe is on the brink. What happens to all its DNA data?

description: The report from the the federal Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives said that the fire that killed more than 100 people and destroyed the town of Lahaina called the fire “accidental.”
title: A downed power line is officially blamed for last year’s Maui wildfire

description: New York Democrats launched a coordinated campaign modeled on more traditional battleground state efforts. Federal, state and local leaders are combining efforts to target a group of House GOP freshmen.
title: How Democrats are targeting red seats in blue New York to help win back the House

description: Financial aid funds that help women pay for abortions — or travel to other states to access care — are struggling financially, despite abortion's role in this year's elections.
title: It's harder to pay and travel for abortion care, but support funds are struggling

description: Harris will travel Thursday to Ripon, Wisconsin — home to the Little White Schoolhouse, where an 1854 meeting led to the birth of the Republican Party. She'll be joined by former GOP Rep. Liz Cheney.
title: Kamala Harris is making an unusual pilgrimage today -- to the birthplace of the GOP

description: The small western North Carolina towns of Marshall and Hot Springs were wrecked by historic floods caused by Tropical Storm Helene's rainfall. Days later, residents are just starting the cleanup.
title: Shovel by shovel, N.C. towns dig out from Helene mud and debris

description: With so much focus on the presidential election, keep in mind these down-ballot races can lead to big changes in your state when it comes to policies like abortion, health care and criminal justice.
title: Too much presidential politics? State legislatures are also on the ballot

description: Subramaniam Iswaran is the first Singaporean minister to be jailed in almost fifty years. A case that has shocked a country famed for its squeaky-clean reputation.
title: Former Singapore minister sentenced to a year in prison in rare corruption case
